;

; On November 24, 2023, the second batch of commercial houses in Taicang City, Jiangsu Province, "replaced the new with the old" registration ended. According to the official official of the Propaganda Department of the Taicang Municipal Party Committee, the citizens can sell the eligible second -hand housing to the state -owned enterprise, and then set up a new house designated by state -owned enterprises.

;

; Taicang is the county -level city -level city in Suzhou. In 2022, GDP was 165.357 billion yuan, ranking sixth in various cities in Jiangsu.

;

; "Taicang Release" has explained the policy intention of changing the old new policy. On the one hand, it supports improvement of the demand for house purchase, and on the other hand, it is to enrich the types of talent apartments and affordable housing supply. "After the old house purchased is transformed into a talent apartment or the affordable house, the distribution of the listing will be wider, and there will be more room for citizens to choose."

;

; Except for Taicang, since 2023 More than ten cities have been promoted to change new commercial houses.

;

; Initially, it was initiated by developers in Yangzhou, Jinan and other places; after that, industry associations such as Zibo, Nanjing and other places organized developers and intermediary agencies to "sell old and new"; , Combine with affordable rental housing. During the evolution of the model, the participation of local governments and urban investment platforms became higher and higher.

;

; "Old House's Byset Payment"

;

; In the old -fashioned new plan of Taicang, second -hand housing is sold to state -owned enterprises, and new houses replaced are also developed by state -owned enterprises.

;

; The "Taicang Release" introduced that the first batch of optional houses included 3 communities, all developed by Taicang Urban Development Group Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as Chengfa Group). The second batch of extensions to 8 communities, Taicang City Construction Investment Group Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as Urban Investment Group) also participated.

;

; The company's investigation shows that the two companies are controlled by 100%of the State -owned Assets Supervision and Management Office of the Taicang Municipal Government. Southern Weekend reporters consulted in the name of home buyers, and many of the buyers who participated in the old real estate introduced the replacement process:

;

; Chengfa Group or Urban Investment Group will conduct price evaluation of second -hand housing. New house models are deducted from 60%of the total price of the new house. The new houses purchased were developed by these two state -owned enterprises.

;

; "It is equivalent to using the old house to the first payment." One of the positions of the industry said. Suppose you want to replace a new house of 3 million yuan. The maximum old house can reach 1.8 million yuan, and the remaining 1.2 million yuan can be loan to the bank. If the old house is worth more than 1.8 million yuan, state -owned enterprises will not be cash back, but it can be replaced with a new house worth more than 3 million yuan.

;

; In this process, the acquisition of second -hand housing for state -owned enterprises does not need to invest additional funds. 60%of the deduction ratio restrictions to ensure that they still have cash to account for new houses.

;

; This also means that the new house changed by the owner must be more expensive than the old house, but compared with selling old houses and buying new houses, it is greatly shortened with the old replacement.

;

; A real estate agent in Suzhou told Southern Weekend reporters that the average sales cycle of local second -hand housing is 89 months. A real estate agency in Taicang said that if you want to sell a house, the listing price is 100,000 to 200,000 yuan lower than the market price.

;

; Participate in the old replacement of the new. According to the two state -owned enterprises' real estate consultants, all processes can be completed in just two or three months.

;

; The one -location consultant of Chengfa Group also reported. The real estate she was in charge was on the designated list of the policy. The old house on her hand was not easy to sell, and she decided to try to replace the company's new house directly.

;

; "(replacement of the old) is suitable for old communities that are difficult to sell." She told the southern weekend that the old and poor second -hand houses are currently not sold on the market, but as long as it is a 70 -year property residential house The construction area is below 144 square meters, and the old can be replaced by the old.

;

; According to the "Taicang Release" report, most of the first batch of residents who signed the "replacement of the old" mostly lived in the old communities in the old town.

;

; The reporter of the Southern Weekend called the 8 communities designated as a new home. It was learned that 6 of them were regular housing. Most of them were newly opened improved real estate. Two or three years later, the house was concentrated.

;

; Follow up in many places

;

; In fact, Taicang, which has been released earlier, is not large with the old and new scale.

;

; The first -level industry consultant of Taicang City Fa Group introduced that the first batch of only 100 places for the old replacement, 200 people participated in the registration, and finally sold only thirty or forty sets. Because after registration, many owners have given up because of unsatisfactory listings and prices.

;

; The second batch of quota expands to 800, 500 Cityfa Group, and 300 Urban Investment Group. In the 8th communities, there are only dozens of new houses in each community, most of which account for less than 1/10. As of 5 hours before the registration, the number has not been reported.

;

; Multi -location consultants told the south weekend reporter that second -hand houses that want to replace must settle loans. After the replacement, if the new house has not been delivered, it is necessary to pay the rent to the state -owned enterprise.

;

; Following Taicang, Lianyungang City, Jiangsu Province has also launched similar policies. The Local Housing and Urban Construction Bureau issued the "Notice on Further Promoting the Real Estate Market in the Real Estate of the Housing Consumption" on October 17, 2023, and proposed to explore "selling old and new".

;

; The specific policy is to develop a development project that has not been constructed and contains affordable housing. Use of housing or talent room.

;

; A staff member of the Lianyungang Housing and Urban -Rural Development Bureau introduced to the reporter from the south weekend that the specific participating state -owned enterprises were Lianyungang Urban Construction Holdings Group Co., Ltd., and second -hand housing was acquired by the company. "The replacement new house is estimated to be developed by the company."

;

; But the current policy is still in the exploration stage, and specific details such as replacement methods and existing house transformation have not been drafted.

;

; Haining and Lishui, Zhejiang Province, will be directly subsidized by finance and encourage housing companies to acquire stock housing.

;

; Among them, Haining proposed that the financial subsidy of 2%of the total purchase funds to the housing company purchased the stock house, and Lishui gave the old house transaction taxes for 100%subsidy. Among them, individuals purchased second -hand housing. The transaction tax subsidy subsidy and house purchase subsidy is high.

;

; Haining requires that the main body of the purchase and new commercial housing sale must be the same real estate enterprise. A reporter from the Southern Weekend consulted in the name of buyers. A staff member of the Local Housing and Urban Construction Bureau said that the government did not designate which housing companies could replace it and did not limit it to state -owned enterprises.

;

; Specific developers' selection and replacement prices are negotiated by owners and enterprises. The second -hand housing acquired by the developer is also handled by itself, and there is no notice as a affordable housing.

;

; The real estate enterprise undertakes the secondary sales profit and loss

;

; The earliest, the old replacement is mainly based on the marketing of industry associations and private enterprises as the main body.

;

; On September 6, 2023, the Zibo Municipal Real Estate Development Association, the Municipal Real Estate Broker and Evaluation Association jointly launched a new signing ceremony of the old replacement. The first 12 developers and intermediary agencies signed a cooperation agreement. According to the list released by Zibo Daily, the participating subjects are mainly private enterprises.

;

; A staff member of the Zibo Real Estate Development Association told the Southern Weekend reporter that this measure is more accurate to say "selling old and new". It is mainly to help customers sell houses through additional push and drainage, and then replace the new houses that deliver the deposit and lock the house after the old houses are sold. If they are not sold smoothly, the deposit will be refunded.

;

; "Mainly shorten trading time and save transaction costs." The staff member said. In addition to Zibo, this model has also adopted this model in Nanjing, Nanjing City, Jiangsu Province.

;

; Before that, there were also private developers replaced the old way by acquiring second -hand houses.

;

; Jiangsu New Energy Real Estate Group Co., Ltd. (hereinafter referred to as New Energy Real Estate) at the end of September launched a new event. Its official micro -introduction, the company provides two modes of direct replacement and commissioning. The latter is similar to Zibo that the company commissioned an intermediary agency to help the owners sell old buying new. The former was directly acquired by the new energy real estate.

;

; Southern weekend reporters consulting in the name of home buyers, a staff member of the company said that this event is still ongoing. The replacement new house must be developed by new energy home ownership, and second -hand housing can be a product of other developers.

;

; She introduced that the company had launched the old replacement as early as 2016, mainly to promote the sales of new houses. In the direct replacement mode, the old house is valued and acquired by the company, and then resold to the market. The company is borne by the company.

;

; The key is that the new house required for new energy home ownership must be twice the price of the old house. It has requirements for the age, location and elevator of the old house, and the loan must be basically settled.

;

; Jinan Greenland Lansing Mansion also launched similar direct replacement activities in August 2023. Real Estate Real Estate Consultants introduced to the South Weekend reporter that the owners participating in the replacement must pay the house to the company in accordance with the evaluation price of Greenland Group (600606.SH), and then buy a new house developed by the company.

;

; Like new energy home ownership, Greenland Group has higher requirements for the quality of old houses acquired. In addition, when the owner receives the old house repurchase, it is necessary to pay the company's purchase of new house purchase funds, and the new house they purchase is about 40%higher than the total price of the old house.

;

; According to the Qilu Evening News, about two months after the activity was launched, the Greenland Lanting Mansion replaced more than 30 houses. Greenland Group also copied this model to some projects in Qingdao, Weifang, Linyi and other cities.

;

; A senior real estate practitioner in Jinan analyzed the reporter from the southern weekend that under the current market conditions, it is not cost -effective to transfer the rent after acquiring second -hand houses. Acquisition at a lower price, and then selling more likely to the market. But the essence is still to promote the sales of new houses, and second -hand housing is not the focus of profit.

;

; Shen Xiaoling, the research director of the company of Kerry Research Center, wrote a new report with the old replacement. She told Southern Weekend reporters that the reason why localities were intensive to launch new measures for the old replacement were mainly due to the current poor liquidity in the second -hand housing market, which limited the release of improving the demand for house purchase, and provided a path for breaking this dilemma.

;

; According to her observation, there are also differences in the new effects of different modes in different modes. With the current difficulty of refracting the new house and the large number of second -hand housing listings, many urban effects that implement the intermediary -to -sell model are not obvious.

;

; The effect of direct replacement is more intuitive, but the acquisition of second -hand housing has certain requirements for the amount of funds of developers. There are not many real estate companies that choose this model.
